verses.verse: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> reigns, <S%H4427><s%> let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> tremble; <S%H7264><s%> He is enthroned <S%H3427><s%> [above] the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> let the earth <S%H776><s%> shake! <S%H5120><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> And He is exalted <S%H7311><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
Let them praise <S%H3034><s%> Thy great <S%H1419><s%> and awesome <S%H3372><s%> name; <S%H8034><s%> Holy <S%H6918><s%> is He.

And the strength <S%H5797><s%> of the King <S%H4428><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> justice; <S%H4941><s%> Thou hast established <S%H3559><s%> equity; <S%H4339><s%> Thou hast executed <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Exalt <S%H7311><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> And worship <S%H7812><s%> at His footstool <S%H1916><s%>; <S%H7272><s%> Holy <S%H6918><s%> is He.

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> were among His priests, <S%H3548><s%> And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> was among those who called <S%H7121><s%> on His name; <S%H8034><s%> They called <S%H7121><s%> upon the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and He answered <S%H6030><s%> them.

He spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them in the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud; <S%H6051><s%> They kept <S%H8104><s%> His testimonies, <S%H9381><s%> And the statute <S%H2706><s%> that He gave <S%H5414><s%> them.

O Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> Thou didst answer <S%H6030><s%> them; Thou wast <S%H1961><s%> a forgiving <S%H5375><s%> God <S%H410><s%> to them, And [yet] an avenger <S%H5358><s%> of their [evil] deeds. <S%H5949><s%>

Exalt <S%H7311><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> And worship <S%H7812><s%> at His holy <S%H6944><s%> hill; <S%H2022><s%> For holy <S%H6918><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>
